org.libav

Interface IMediaReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMediaReader

    public interface IMediaReader
    Media reader interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

        Returns:

      • seek

        void seek(long time)
          throws LibavException
        Seek media at the given position.
        Parameters:
        time - a seek position in miliseconds
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the media cannot be seeked

      • dropAllBuffers

        void dropAllBuffers()
        Drop all read buffers (useful for media streams or seeking).

      • readNextPacket

        boolean readNextPacket()
                       throws LibavException
        Read a next packet from the media stream and send it immediately to all packet consumers for the corresponding stream.
        Returns:
        true if there was a packet to process, false in case of EOF
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

      • readNextPacket

        boolean readNextPacket(int streamIndex)
                       throws LibavException
        Check whether there is a packet with the given stream index in the buffer and send it to all its consumers. If there is no such packet in the buffer read a next packet and check its stream index. If it is same as the given stream index send it, otherwise put it into the corresponding buffer.
        Parameters:
        streamIndex - a stream index
        Returns:
        true if there was a packet to process, false in case of EOF
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

      • readNextAudioPacket

        boolean readNextAudioPacket(int audioStreamIndex)
                            throws LibavException
        Translate the given audio stream index to stream index and call readNextPacket(int).
        Parameters:
        audioStreamIndex - an audio stream index
        Returns:
        true if there was a packet to process, false in case of EOF
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

      • readNextVideoPacket

        boolean readNextVideoPacket(int videoStreamIndex)
                            throws LibavException
        Translate the given video stream index to stream index and call readNextPacket(int).
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        Returns:
        true if there was a packet to process, false in case of EOF
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

      • setStreamBufferingEnabled

        void setStreamBufferingEnabled(int streamIndex,
                             boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable buffering for the stream at the given position. The buffering is disabled by default.
        Parameters:
        streamIndex - a stream index
        enabled - true to enable it, false to disable it

      • isStreamBufferingEnabled

        boolean isStreamBufferingEnabled(int streamIndex)
        Check whether the buffering is enabled for the stream at the given position.
        Parameters:
        streamIndex - a stream index
        Returns:
        true if the buffering is enabled, false otherwise

      • setVideoStreamBufferingEnabled

        void setVideoStreamBufferingEnabled(int videoStreamIndex,
                                  boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable buffering for the video stream at the given position. The buffering is disabled by default.
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        enabled - true to enable it, false to disable it

      • isVideoStreamBufferingEnabled

        boolean isVideoStreamBufferingEnabled(int videoStreamIndex)
        Check whether the buffering is enabled for the video stream at the given position.
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        Returns:
        true if the buffering is enabled, false otherwise

      • setAudioStreamBufferingEnabled

        void setAudioStreamBufferingEnabled(int audioStreamIndex,
                                  boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable buffering for the audio stream at the given position. The buffering is disabled by default.
        Parameters:
        audioStreamIndex - an audio stream index
        enabled - true to enable it, false to disable it

      • isAudioStreamBufferingEnabled

        boolean isAudioStreamBufferingEnabled(int audioStreamIndex)
        Check whether the buffering is enabled for the audio stream at the given position.
        Parameters:
        audioStreamIndex - an audio stream index
        Returns:
        true if the buffering is enabled, false otherwise

      • close

        void close()
           throws LibavException
        Close the media reader and release all associated resources.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while closing the media reader

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Check whether the media reader is closed or not.
        Returns:
        true if the media reader is closed, false otherwise
